name: Rat
description: The Rat is a tiny, agile rodent capable of slipping through small spaces, commonly found in cities, sewers, and forests. It has poor combat abilities but can spread diseases and gather in large numbers.
memorable: Rats can become a significant annoyance when in swarms, despite their low individual threat level.
goals: Primarily scavenging for food or infesting homes and dungeons.
relations: Often encountered with urban wildlife and used by spellcasters as familiars.
environment: Commonly found in urban and rural settings, especially in dirty or dark places.
strengths: Possesses keen sense of smell which aids in detection and avoidance of threats.
weaknesses: Extremely low hit points and poor physical attributes make it vulnerable.
attacks: Bite attack that deals minimal piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Smell grants advantage on Perception checks relying on smell.
senses: Has a heightened perception score of 15 when using its sense of smell.
additional_information: Accustomed to Filth gives advantage on saving throws against diseases.
Stealthy capabilities make it effective at avoiding detection.
Often used in roleplaying scenarios involving survival.
Commonly seen as pests in both rural and urban settings.
Can be trained or used by spellcasters.
test_queries: tiny agile creature with keen sense of smell
nuisance pest found in urban areas
rat that is often used as a familiar
